entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
